original_title: Long Live Rock... Celebrate the Chaos
overview: Featuring exclusive interviews with the leading titans of rock that include: Metallica, Guns N' Roses, Slipknot, Korn, Avenged Sevenfold, Rob Zombie, Five Finger Death Punch, Prophets Of Rage, Greta Van Fleet, Halestorm, and many, many more, "Long Live Rock" is a deep dive into the fandom of this often misunderstood but beloved genre of music.
tagline: You've seen the traditional concerts but you haven't seen the uncensored and extreme side of concerts....
title: Long Live Rock... Celebrate the Chaos
